paper_keywords: Fuzzy integral equations of the second kind
paper_abstract: In recent years, many numerical methods have been proposed for solving fuzzy linear integral equations. In this paper, we use the divided differences and finite differences methods for solving a parametric of the fuzzy Fredholm integral equations of the second kind with arbitrary kernel and present some examples to illustrate this method.
paper_title: The numerical solution of linear fuzzy Fredholm integral equations of the second kind by using finite and divided differences methods
